amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study on driver's license security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley (OR) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 203 (Roll no. 472).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Hooley (OR).
